original: Johnsson, Karl Hugo Alexius, fd. läroverksadjunkt. Mariestad, f. 15/7/75 i Karlskrona av byggmäst. Carl J. o. Johanna Kristina Johnsson. G. 1. 18 m. Margareta Brattström, d. 24; 2. 37 m. Dagmar Elisabet Johansson. — Mog:ex. i Karlskrona 94, teol. fil. ex. i Upps. 96, teor. teol. ex. 03, fil. kand. i Lund 07, provår v. norra ’latin i Sthlm 10-11. E. lär. i Falun 07-10, i Västerås 11-12, v. Sikara folksk :sem. 12-13, adj. i kristend :kunsk., rnodersm. o. hist. m. samh :lära v. Mariestads sam-realsk. 12-40. Just :min. omb. i Mariestad 312-43.
translated: Johnsson, Karl Hugo Alexius, former senior high school teacher. Born in Mariestad on July 15th, 1875 to builder Carl J. and Johanna Kristina Johnsson of Karlskrona. Married 1st in 1918 to Margareta Brattström, who passed away in 1924; and 2nd in 1937 to Dagmar Elisabet Johansson. Education: Student of the Mogadorexamen (a secondary school leaving exam) in Karlskrona in 1894, Bachelor of Theology in Uppsala in 1896, Theoretical Theology exam in 1903, Bachelor of Arts in Lund in 1907, teaching assistant at Norra Latin School in Stockholm for one year in 1910-11. Employed as a teacher in Falun from 1907-1910, in Västerås from 1911-1912, at Sikara folk high school from 1912-1913, and as a senior high school teacher in religious knowledge, Swedish language and history with social studies at Mariestad's Sam-realskolan from 1912-1940. Served as a representative of the Ministry of Justice in Mariestad from 1931-1943.

education.name: Teaching assistant at Norra Latin School

employment.title: Representative of the Ministry of Justice
